definition[0]: a B2E website is one that is for all the people who work for a company, providing them with information about the company, and also news and other information that may be interesting for them
example[0]: You can tailor your B2E portal pages to meet the specific needs of different departments in your company.
definition[1]: a B2E approach is one in which the business gives its main attention to the needs of its employees, so that it can keep good workers and encourage them to do good work
example[1]: Most organizations today can benefit from using B2E strategies.
definition[2]: B2E products and services are sold on the Internet for companies to use when employing people
